#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

int main() {
    
          int t;
          scanf("%d",&t);
          while ( t-- ){
                int n,i,k; 
                scanf("%d",&n);
                int ref[10001];
                for(i = 0; i<10001 ; i++ ){
                      ref[i] = 0;
                      }
                for (i=0;i<n;i++){
                    scanf("%d",&k);
                      ref[k]++;
                      }
                int max = ref[1];
                int key = 1;
                for(int i=1;i<10001;i++) {
	                    if(ref[i] > max){
                           max = ref[i];
		                   key = i;
	                    }    
                     }
                
                printf("%d %d\n",key,max);

          }       
          return 0;
}
